entities.name: patronus
entities.description: A kind of anti-dementor that acts as a shield between the wizard and dementors. It is a positive force, a projection of hope, happiness, and desire to survive.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin, who teaches Harry about Patronus conjuring.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A large figure mentioned in Harry's vision.

entities.name: dementor
entities.description: An entity that feeds on human happiness and hope.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The student who is learning about Patronus conjuring from Professor Lupin.

relationships.description: A Patronus acts as a shield between the wizard and dementors.
Professor Lupin is teaching Harry about Patronus conjuring.
